pollsystem.close.nopoll.message: There is currently no poll running.

pollsystem.open.moreoptions.message: More than one option is required for a poll.

pollsystem.open.usage.message: Usage: !poll open "question" "option1, option2, ..." [seconds] [min votes].  If seconds is 0, defaults to 60.

pollsystem.poll.running.message: There is a poll running for "$1". Use "!vote [option]" to vote. The options are "$2".

pollsystem.poll.started.message: $1 started a poll for $2 seconds (minimum votes: $3): $4! Use "!vote [option]" to vote. Options: $5

pollsystem.poll.started.nottime.message: $1 started a poll (minimum votes: $2): $3! Use "!vote [option]" to vote. Options: $4

pollsystem.results.404.message: There is no latest poll to retrieve results from!

pollsystem.runpoll.novotes.message: The poll on "$1" has ended! Not enough votes were cast!

pollsystem.runpoll.started.message: Poll started! Use "!poll close" to end the poll manually

pollsystem.runpoll.tie.message: The poll on "$1" has ended in a tie! Check !poll results.

pollsystem.runpoll.winner.message: The poll on "$1" has ended! The winner is "$2"!

pollsystem.vote.nopoll.message: There is currently no poll running.
